page.title: 02MONTFORD BR.- WORK & HOUSING
page.content:
The work pattern of the village has changed a lot in recent years. Not many years ago, most of the villagers would have been employed on local farms but with the increasing mechanisation of farming, most people have had to find work elsewhere, mainly in the nearby towns of Shrewsbury and Oswestry.
Housing within the village has also changed. In common with many Shropshire villages, a number of council properties have been built recently. A small number of private houses have also been added. It is only about 20 years since the majority of houses in the village have been connected to mains sewerage and water.
